title: Lot 13 [Complete]
description:
- Contains all issues of Lot 13 from issues #1-5. Published by DC Comics.

Genre: Horror

**I dont own or take credit for any of the content contained in this torrent, all credit goes to the creator(s) of the comic.**


Description:

In 1670, in a small colony in Fairfax, Virginia, Robert Wyatt killed his family before taking his own life.  The town elders held a tribunal and found Wyatt and his family guilty of mortal sin and cast their bodies into unholy ground for eternity...or did they?  

When a young couple and their three children move into a mysterious apartment building, they soon begin to see apparitions of the long dead family of Robert Wyatt.  The secrets of the house--and dangers--are deepening with every passing hour as the young family struggles to escape the horrors surrounding them.
